name: Carlos
description: Our famous pepperoni, Spanish sausage, mushrooms, black olives, bell peppers, onions & diced tomatoes.

name: The Everest
description: Pepperoni, Italian sausage, salami, linguica, beef, mushrooms, black olives, bell peppers, and onion. Pizza the way it oughta be!

name: Mt. Veggiemore
description: Lots of mushrooms, black olives, bell peppers, artichoke hearts, and fresh tomatoes. A pizza so great, its likeness should be carved in the side of a mountain.

name: Pike's Peak
description: Mounds of sausage, pepperoni, beef, salami, linguica, and ham. If we put any more meat on this pizza, you'd need a side of mashed potatoes and gravy.

name: Garlic Chicken
description: Tender chicken pieces, tomatoes, olives, mushrooms and fresh green onions with a creamy garlic white or traditional red sauce.

name: Garlic Combo
description: A combination of creamy garlic white sauce piled high with pepperoni, mushrooms, olives, sausage, green onions and diced tomatoes.

name: Pineapple Chicken
description: A tropical treat! Made with tangy KC Masterpiece BBQ sauce, crispy bacon, juicy Dole pineapple, and grilled chicken.

name: Chicken Club
description: Loaded with our rich and creamy garlic sauce, tender chicken, crisp bacon, fresh diced tomatoes and sweet green onions.

name: Bacon Classic
description: Crispy bacon and tender ham in creamy garlic sauce, mozzarella cheese, sliced mushrooms, olives, and sweet green onions.

name: Garlic Tuscan
description: Topped with Louisiana Hot Sausage, salami, black olives, garlic, fresh green onions, and sun dried tomatoes on our traditional red sauce.

name: Meat Ball
description: Juicy Meatballs/Green Pepper/Onion

name: Philly Steak
description: Steak Meat/Mushroom/Green Pepper/Onion/White Cheddar On The Base

name: Butter Chicken
description: Butter Chicken/Green Peppers/Onions/Roasted Red Peppers

name: BBQ Chicken
description: Bbq Chicken/Mushroom/Red Onion

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Tandoori Chicken/Green Peppers/Onions/Roasted Red Peppers

name: Buffalo Chicken
description: Onion/ Hot Pepper/ Buffalo Chicken

name: Spicy Italian
description: Thin Crest/Hot Italian Sausage/Ham/Roasted Red Peppers

name: Bacon Cheese Burger
description: Bacon/Ground Beef/Cheddar/Mozzarella Cheese

name: Garden Veggie
description: Green Pepper/Onion/Tomato/ Green Olive

name: Health Smart
description: Green Pepper/Onion/Mushroom/Brococcli

name: Paneer (Curd Cheese)
description: Green Peppers/Onions/Roasted Red Peppers

name: Quattro Formaggi
description: Tomatoes, and the cheeses mozzarella, stracchino, fontina and gorgonzola.

name: Pizza romana
description: Tomato, mozzarella, anchovies, oregano, oil.

name: Alla casalinga
description: Consists of a thin layer of dough which is stretched into an oiled, square 'Sicilian' pan, topped sparingly with shredded mozzarella, crushed uncooked canned tomatoes, chopped garlic and olive oil, and baked until the top bubbles and the bottom is crisp.

name: Capricciosa
description: Mozzarella, tomato, mushrooms, artichokes, cooked ham, olives, oil.

name: Spicy Veggie
description: Green Pepper/Onion/Tomatoes/Hot Peppers
